description.desc: Slicing web design to responsive website using HTML & CSS.
Using React JS to build a website with single page application concept.

Using Node JS & Express JS to build a server.

Explore the best color combination for the website

portfolio.title: Weather App Lite
portfolio.description: Weather App Lite is a website that can show the weather in a city. This website is built using React JS and using OpenWeatherMap API to fetch the data.

portfolio.title: Classroom 3D Model
portfolio.description: Clasrooms 3D Model is Made with Blender This is my third 3D model. I made this 3D model to remember my first classroom in SMK Telkom Malang.
